ing: 1 teaspoon roasted chicken stock reduction (such as Glace de Poulet GoldÂ®)
des: "I love this sauce (it's actually more of a gravy) recipe for the ease and flavor. Pour or spoon over desired dish and enjoy."
ins: Combine butter and chicken stock reduction in a large skillet over medium heat; stir until melted and combined, about 1 minute. Pour in apple cider; bring to a boil. Cook until mixture is reduced by 2/3, about 5 minutes. Stir in heavy cream; simmer sauce until thick and reduced by 1/2, about 5 minutes.
